description:
Fixed attach logic so that DOMView can be initialized before or after added to Widget.
 * Attach native view in Init if Widget exists.
 * Attach native view when the view is added to Widget if
   it's initialized but not yet attached.

Detach native view when it's removed from parent view so that
it can be re-attached.

BUG=none
TEST=none

Committed: http://src.chromium.org/viewvc/chrome?view=rev&revision=57612

messages.text:
http://codereview.chromium.org/3152053/diff/8001/9001
File chrome/browser/views/dom_view.cc (right):

http://codereview.chromium.org/3152053/diff/8001/9001#newcode61
chrome/browser/views/dom_view.cc:61: Detach();
Is the tab_contents_->GetNativeView() correctly deleted if the view is removed then deleted? I'm sure it is, but this looks like a new code path and just want to make it isn't problematic.

On 2010/08/25 23:29:23, sky wrote:
> http://codereview.chromium.org/3152053/diff/8001/9001
> File chrome/browser/views/dom_view.cc (right):
> 
> http://codereview.chromium.org/3152053/diff/8001/9001#newcode61
> chrome/browser/views/dom_view.cc:61: Detach();
> Is the tab_contents_->GetNativeView() correctly deleted if the view is removed
> then deleted? I'm sure it is, but this looks like a new code path and just want
> to make it isn't problematic.

I added new browser test to tests several use cases. linux_chromeos_valgrind bot has link issue now and lei is working on fix. I'll run the bot once it's fixed.

subject: Fixed attach logic so that DOMView can be initialized before or after added to Widget.
